ingredients.ingredient: 36 milk chocolate candy kisses (such as Hershey's Kisses®), unwrapped

cookingTips: Roll dough in sugar before baking for crispy edges
Press chocolate kiss into warm cookies immediately after removing from oven
Don't use natural peanut butter; it won't hold together properly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user make simple three-ingredient cookies and explain why pressing in chocolate kisses while cookies are warm creates the best texture.
